mapper.sql: id, business_id, asset_group, number, name, install_type, serial, area_id, category_model, manufacturer, asset_status, admittance_status, operation_system, responsible_user_id, latitude, longitude, house_location, firmware_version, uuid, asset_source, importance_degree, describle, first_enter_nett, first_discover_time, is_innet, service_life, buy_date, version, warranty, install_template_id, baseline_template_id, baseline_template_correlation_gmt, install_template_correlation_gmt, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_user, modify_user, status

number, name, install_type, serial, area_id, category_model, manufacturer, asset_status, admittance_status, operation_system, responsible_user_id, house_location, firmware_version, uuid, asset_source, importance_degree, describle, first_enter_nett, first_discover_time, is_innet, service_life, buy_date, version, warranty, install_template_id, baseline_template_id, baseline_template_correlation_gmt, install_template_correlation_gmt, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified, create_user, modify_user
mapper.select:
select
from

select
from

select count(1) count from ( select DISTINCT asset.id from asset asset left join asset_ip_relation air on asset.id = air.asset_id left join asset_mac_relation amr on asset.id = amr.asset_id left join asset_user asset_user on asset.responsible_user_id = asset_user.id
) t

SELECT count(1) count FROM asset a left JOIN asset_network_equipment b on a.id = b.asset_id and b.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_safety_equipment d on a.id = d.asset_id AND d.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_network_card c on a.id = c.asset_id and c.`status` = 1 WHERE (b.inner_ip = #{ip} OR c.ip_address = #{ip} OR d.ip = #{ip}) AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.status !=9

select distinct manufacturer from
where status = 1

select
from
where 1 = 1
and category_model in
#{item}

select manufacturer, count(manufacturer) num from
where status=1
and area_id in
#{areaId}
and asset_status in
#{item}
GROUP BY manufacturer order by num desc

select asset_status, count(asset_status) num from
where status=1
and area_id in
#{areaId}
GROUP BY asset_status

select count(1) from
where status=1 and asset_status!=9
and area_id in
#{areaId}

select * from asset where id in
#{item}
mapper.update: update asset SET asset_group = #{assetGroupName} where id = #{assetId}
mapper.select:
select count(distinct (t1.asset_id)) from asset_patch_rel t1 inner join patch p ON t1.patch_id = p.id inner join asset t2 on t1.asset_id = t2.id where t1.patch_status != 5
and t2.area_id IN
#{item}
and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 AND p.STATUS = 1 AND p.patch_status = 3 and t2.asset_status in(7,8)

select count(distinct (t1.asset_id)) from asset_vul_rel t1 inner JOIN vul v ON t1.vul_id = v.id inner join asset t2 on t1.asset_id = t2.id where t1.vul_status != 5
and t2.area_id IN
#{item}
and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 AND v.STATUS = 1 AND v.vul_status = 4 and t2.asset_status in(7,8)

select number from
where id = #{id}

select area_id from
where id = #{id}

SELECT ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1 ) + ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset_software WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1) as n

select uuid from
where id = #{id}
select count(id) from asset where id!=#{id} and number=#{number}
select count(id) from asset where id!=#{id} and name=#{name}

select count(1) from
where status = 1 and asset_status in (3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10,11)

select asset_id as id, count(asset_id) as count from alarm_current_records
WHERE asset_id IN
#{item}
group by asset_id

SELECT count(1) count FROM asset_mac_relation m LEFT JOIN asset a ON m.asset_id=a.id WHERE a.`status` =1 AND m.`status` =1 and upper( ( REPLACE ( REPLACE (mac, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) ) ) = upper( REPLACE ( REPLACE ( #{mac}, ':', '' ), '-', '' ) )

update.foreach:
update
set
first_enter_nett = #{asset.firstEnterNett},
asset_status = #{asset.assetStatus},
gmt_modified = #{asset.gmtModified},
modify_user = #{asset.modifyUser},
`status` = #{asset.status}
where id = #{asset.id}

mapper.select:
SELECT asset.*, lib.product_name AS operation_system_name, `user`.`name` AS responsible_user_name, `user`.`mobile` As contact_tel FROM
LEFT JOIN asset_user `user` ON `user`.id = asset.responsible_user_id LEFT JOIN asset_hard_soft_lib lib ON lib.business_id = asset.operation_system where asset.id=#{id}

SELECT asset.id as assetId, assembly.business_id as businessId, assembly.amount, lib.product_name AS productName, lib.supplier, lib.type FROM asset LEFT JOIN asset_assembly assembly ON assembly.asset_id = asset.id LEFT JOIN asset_assembly_lib lib ON lib.business_id = assembly.business_id WHERE asset.id = #{id} and asset.status=1 and assembly.status=1 and lib.status=1
SELECT count(1) count FROM asset a WHERE number = #{number} AND a.`status` = 1

SELECT id,name,asset_status as assetStatus FROM asset WHERE status=1 AND id IN
#{id}
SELECT DISTINCT bt.id, bt.tp_name as value FROM asset asset INNER JOIN baseline_template bt ON asset.baseline_template_id = bt.id

SELECT manufacturer FROM asset where category_model =3 and status=1
and manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%',replace(replace(#{supplier},'%','\%'),'_','\_'),'%')
GROUP BY manufacturer
